message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is quite high for me. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $87 for the product.
